comments.body: The error of the bound `>: Any <: Nothing` is the reason for the `cannot be instantiated` error, the full message is quite clear on the source of the issue.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +27,31 @@    v.brand("boom!")
}
object V { // error: cannot be instantiated
  type Y >: Any <: Nothing  // old-error: only classes can have declared but undefined members
  type Z
